programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: Cab driver Max Durocher's dreams of owning his own limo company are threatened when he agrees to drive a stranger to five locations. He soon finds himself involved with the criminal activities of a contract killer.

programme.title: Magic Mike XXL
programme.desc: Three years after Mike decided to step down from his life as a stripper, his fellow Kings of Tampa are also ready to pack it in. Determined to go out with a bang, the guys set out for Myrtle Beach for one last blow-out, no-holds-barred performance.

programme.title: Just Married
programme.desc: Two people with seemingly nothing in common fall in love and decide to get married.

programme.title: The New Mutants
programme.desc: A group of five young mutants explore their powers and confront their pasts while being detained in a mysterious facility disguised as a hospital.

programme.title: Surrogates
programme.desc: In a futuristic world where humans only interact with each other through their surrogate robots, a police officer must leave the safety of his home to investigate the deaths of others' surrogates.

programme.title: Days of Thunder
programme.desc: A rookie stock car racer must overcome his fear of driving after a near-fatal accident.

programme.title: Super 8
programme.desc: When a group of kids observe an inexplicable train crash, they plunge into an investigation to uncover the source of the abnormal events occurring in their small town.

programme.title: Percy Jackson: Sea of Monsters
programme.desc: When Camp Half-Blood is attacked and its protection compromised, Percy and his friends set off on a dangerous mission. They must recover the Golden Fleece from the Sea of Monsters in order to save their safe haven and stop an ancient evil from rising.

programme.title: I, Robot
programme.desc: In 2035, robots that have been programmed to never hurt humans have become part of the daily lives of people. When the main suspect in the murder of a scientist is a robot, a robot-hating detective begins to wonder if humans are actually safe.

programme.title: Street Gang: How We Got to Sesame Street
programme.desc: A look at the creation of 'Sesame Street' from the people who made it happen.

programme.title: Disturbia
programme.desc: After being placed under house arrest for punching a teacher, Kale Bretch starts spying on his neighbors and witnesses a murder in the house next door.

programme.title: Inside Man
programme.desc: A thief sets out to execute the perfect bank robbery, matching wits against a tough detective with a bad record, but things take a volatile turn when a power broker is brought in to protect the bank owner's interests.

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: A widowed mother and her two daughters add a new stunt to their séance scam, a spirit board. When the youngest finds the board, she contacts a spirit and is possessed. Confronting their fears, the small family risks everything to save themselves.

programme.title: The Happening
programme.desc: A teacher is faced with disturbing changes - people are losing their will for self-preservation. He attempts to figure out and escape the cause of the eerily sudden change in people while trying to keep his girlfriend safe.

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: An outlaw finds his life becoming all the more dangerous when he turns against a gang of criminals.

programme.title: Transporter 2
programme.desc: When the son of a wealthy family is kidnapped, their driver, an ex-special forces operative, must use all of his skills to bring the boy back safely.

programme.title: Diary of a Mad Black Woman
programme.desc: Helen McCarter has everything going for her, until her wealthy husband admits to having an affair and throws her out of the house. A distraught Helen turns to her family as she learns to stand up on her own two feet.

programme.title: The Benchwarmers
programme.desc: Three guys try to make up for the missed opportunities in their childhoods by forming a baseball team to compete against standard Little League squads.

programme.title: Hard Knocks: In Season
programme.desc: Follow an NFL team through the football season.

programme.title: Senseless
programme.desc: A college student takes part in an experiment which promises to heighten his senses.

programme.title: Madea's Family Reunion
programme.desc: While planning a family reunion, Madea finds herself plagued by family trouble, including her sister's death, a niece's wedding to a handsome, but abusive man and a troubled and angry court appointed ward.

programme.desc: An amnesiac is rescued at sea by the crew of an Italian fishing boat. Nearly dead, he carries nothing but the bullets in his back and the bank account number embedded in his hip. He must try to piece together his mysterious past while eluding assassins.

programme.title: Wonder Woman 1984
programme.desc: A superhero must save the world from destruction after an ancient artifact goes missing.
